name: Verify app output contains required endpoints via API
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- Shell app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Call `output` API.

### Verify that `output` API response contains required endpoints:

- Http internal API
- Https external API
descriptionHtml:
Pre-conditions:

  • Shell app installed.

Steps:

  • Login with valid credentials.
  • Call output API.

Verify that output API response contains required endpoints:

  • Http internal API
  • Https external API

testStage.descriptionHtml:
Pre-conditions:

  • Shell app installed.

Steps:

  • Login with valid credentials.
  • Call output API.

Verify that output API response contains required endpoints:

  • Http internal API
  • Https external API
